Description: Clay tablet; complete; loan from Shamash temple; Puzurum son of Ili-Kadri has received 38 1/6 shekels of silver from the god Shamash, he will pay interest at the rate set by Shamash, at the time of the harvest he will repay the silver and the interest on
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.289)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
